verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to her that is filthy <S%H4754><s%> and polluted, <S%H1351><s%> to the oppressing <S%H3238><s%> city! <S%H5892><s%>

She obeyed <S%H8085><s%> not the voice; <S%H6963><s%> she received <S%H3947><s%> not correction; <S%H4148><s%> she trusted <S%H982><s%> not in the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> she drew not near <S%H7126><s%> to her God. <S%H430><s%>

Her princes <S%H8269><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> her are roaring <S%H7580><s%> lions; <S%H738><s%> her judges <S%H8199><s%> are evening <S%H6153><s%> wolves; <S%H2061><s%> they gnaw <S%H1633><s%> not the bones <S%H1633><s%> till the morrow. <S%H1242><s%>

Her prophets <S%H5030><s%> are light <S%H6348><s%> and treacherous <S%H900><s%> persons: <S%H582><s%> her priests <S%H3548><s%> have polluted <S%H2490><s%> the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> they have done violence <S%H2554><s%> to the law. <S%H8451><s%>

The just <S%H6662><s%> LORD <S%H3068><s%> is in the middle <S%H7130><s%> thereof; he will not do <S%H6213><s%> iniquity: <S%H5766><s%> every morning <S%H1242><s%> does he bring <S%H5414><s%> his judgment <S%H4941><s%> to light, <S%H216><s%> he fails <S%H5737><s%> not; but the unjust <S%H5767><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> shame. <S%H1322><s%>

I have cut <S%H3772><s%> off the nations: <S%H1471><s%> their towers <S%H6438><s%> are desolate; <S%H8074><s%> I made their streets <S%H2351><s%> waste, <S%H2717><s%> that none <S%H1097><s%> passes <S%H5674><s%> by: their cities <S%H5892><s%> are destroyed, <S%H6658><s%> so that there is no <S%H1097><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> that there is none <S%H369><s%> inhabitant. <S%H3427><s%>

I said, <S%H559><s%> Surely <S%H389><s%> you will fear <S%H3372><s%> me, you will receive <S%H3947><s%> instruction; <S%H4148><s%> so their dwelling <S%H4583><s%> should not be cut <S%H3772><s%> off, howsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> I punished <S%H6485><s%> them: but they rose <S%H7925><s%> early, <S%H7925><s%> and corrupted <S%H7843><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their doings. <S%H5949><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> wait <S%H2442><s%> you on me, said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> until the day <S%H3117><s%> that I rise <S%H6965><s%> up to the prey: <S%H5706><s%> for my determination <S%H4941><s%> is to gather <S%H622><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> that I may assemble <S%H6908><s%> the kingdoms, <S%H4467><s%> to pour <S%H8210><s%> on them my indignation, <S%H2195><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> my fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger: <S%H639><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be devoured <S%H398><s%> with the fire <S%H784><s%> of my jealousy. <S%H7068><s%>

For then <S%H227><s%> will I turn <S%H2015><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> a pure <S%H1305><s%> language, <S%H8193><s%> that they may all <S%H3605><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> him with one <S%H259><s%> consent. <S%H7926><s%>

From beyond <S%H5676><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> of Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> my suppliants, <S%H6282><s%> even the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of my dispersed, <S%H6327><s%> shall bring <S%H2986><s%> my offering. <S%H4503><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall you not be ashamed <S%H954><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> your doings, <S%H5949><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> you have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against me: for then <S%H227><s%> I will take <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> out of the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you them that rejoice <S%H5947><s%> in your pride, <S%H1346><s%> and you shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5750><s%> be haughty <S%H1361><s%> because of my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

I will also leave <S%H7604><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you an afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and poor <S%H1800><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and they shall trust <S%H2620><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

The remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall not do <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> lies; <S%H3576><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall a deceitful <S%H8649><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> be found <S%H4672><s%> in their mouth: <S%H6310><s%> for they shall feed <S%H7462><s%> and lie <S%H7257><s%> down, <S%H4769><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> shall make them afraid. <S%H2729><s%>

Sing, <S%H7442><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion; <S%H6726><s%> shout, <S%H7321><s%> O Israel; <S%H3478><s%> be glad <S%H8056><s%> and rejoice <S%H5937><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the heart, <S%H3820><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> has taken <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> your judgments, <S%H4941><s%> he has cast <S%H6437><s%> out your enemy: <S%H341><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> even the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> is in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you: you shall not see <S%H7200><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> any more. <S%H5750><s%>
In that day <S%H3117><s%> it shall be said <S%H559><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> Fear <S%H3372><s%> you not: and to Zion, <S%H6726><s%> Let not your hands <S%H3027><s%> be slack. <S%H7503><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you is mighty; <S%H1368><s%> he will save, <S%H3467><s%> he will rejoice <S%H7797><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you with joy; <S%H8057><s%> he will rest <S%H2790><s%> in his love, <S%H160><s%> he will joy <S%H1523><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you with singing. <S%H7440><s%>

I will gather <S%H622><s%> them that are sorrowful <S%H3013><s%> for the solemn <S%H4150><s%> assembly, <S%H4150><s%> who are of you, to whom <S%H5921><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of it was a burden. <S%H4864><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%> I will undo <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that afflict <S%H6031><s%> you: and I will save <S%H3467><s%> her that halts, <S%H6761><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> her that was driven <S%H5080><s%> out; and I will get <S%H7760><s%> them praise <S%H8416><s%> and fame <S%H8034><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> land <S%H776><s%> where they have been put to shame. <S%H1322><s%>

At that time <S%H6256><s%> will I bring <S%H935><s%> you again, even in the time <S%H6256><s%> that I gather <S%H6908><s%> you: for I will make <S%H5414><s%> you a name <S%H8034><s%> and a praise <S%H8416><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> when I turn <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> your captivity <S%H7622><s%> before your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
